item.title: Database with SQLite
item.author: celik.yasin@gmail.com (OneZero)
item.description: Python-SQLite This post is about database programming with Python and SQLite. A database is a collection of data with systematic access and the relationships between these data stacks are defined. Python is work with several database systems which are listed here. SQLite is a good option among these interfaces because its simplicity and easy to use. SQLite is a free software. All codes of this software are publicly available.
